The ‘k-means clustering’ Algorithm¶

The k-means algorithm is used to analyse the data from the satellite ‘Ence’.

analysis.kmeans(filename[, clusters, iterations])

Use kmean algorithm (numpy version) to classify dataset provided.

clustering_numpy.load_data(filepath)

Loading data from csv file.

clustering_numpy.distance(centres, points)

This function calculates the euclidean distance between each point from centres and each point from dataset and stores those distances in an array by using matrix product, which can reduce the usage of for loops and will not change the kmean algorithm itself.

clustering_numpy.cluster(data[, clusters, ...])

Use kmean algorithm (numpy version) to classify dataset provided.

clustering.load_data(filepath)

Loading data from csv file.

clustering.distance(point1, point2)

Calculate the euclidean distance between two points.

clustering.cluster(data[, clusters, iterations])

Use kmean algorithm to classify dataset provided.

aigeanpy
